Sentencas: This paper presents the design of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) tri-generation system that consists of an SOFCcombined heat and power subsystem, an adsorption refrigeration subsystem, and coupling devices between the two subsystems.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: Whereas typical extant designs use absorption techniques, the proposed design employs adsorption refrigeration.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: In this paper, the dynamics of adsorption refrigeration are reported in detail to evaluate the feasibility of the tri-generation system design.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: The design of the coupling devices and instrumentation strategies of the overall system are discussed in detail.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: Simulation results indicate that the proposed SOFC trigeneration system can output 4.35 kW of electrical power, 2.448 kW of exhaust heat power, and 1.348 kW of cooling power.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: The energy efficiency is 64.9%, and the coefficient of performance of the refrigeration is 0.32.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: Varying the electrical output power results in the variation of exhaust heat power but not the cooling power; varying the cooling power affects the exhaust heat power but not the electrical power.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system

Sentencas: These favorable features can be attributed to the proposed heat exchange sequence and active temperature controls of the system.
Titulo: Design and dynamics simulations of small scale solid oxide fuel cell tri-generation system
